resources.title: Everything You Need to Know about AI
resources.summary: A comprehensive introduction to AI concepts for Product Managers. Covers the fundamentals of artificial intelligence, machine learning basics, and how these technologies are transforming product development.
resources.author: Moe Ali

resources.title: PMF For AI Products
resources.summary: Explores the unique challenges of finding product-market fit for AI products. Discusses how traditional PMF frameworks need to be adapted for AI-powered products and provides practical guidance for validation.
resources.author: Miqdad Jaffer

resources.title: Full AI Product Cycle
resources.summary: Insights from OpenAI's product leadership on the complete AI product development cycle. Covers ideation, development, deployment, and iteration specific to AI products.
resources.author: Moe Ali / Miqdad Jaffer

resources.title: AI Prototyping
resources.summary: A practical guide to prototyping AI features and products. Learn techniques for quickly validating AI concepts without extensive engineering resources.
resources.author: Moe Ali

resources.title: Claude Code Masterclass
resources.summary: A comprehensive guide to using Claude Code for product development. Covers setup, best practices, and advanced techniques for PMs looking to leverage AI-assisted coding.
resources.author: Moe Ali

resources.title: Building AI as a System (Moats, Margins, etc)
resources.summary: Strategic framework for building defensible AI products. Explores competitive moats, unit economics, and margin considerations specific to AI-powered businesses.
resources.author: Moe Ali

resources.title: AI Product Strategy 101
resources.summary: An introduction to creating AI product strategy. Covers the fundamentals of strategic thinking for AI products, including market analysis, positioning, and roadmap development.
resources.author: Moe Ali

resources.title: AI Product Strategy Advanced
resources.summary: Advanced frameworks for AI product strategy. Covers the five phases of strategic AI product development and how to navigate each phase effectively.
resources.author: Moe Ali

resources.title: AI Pricing
resources.summary: A masterclass on pricing AI products. Covers value-based pricing, usage-based models, and how to balance costs with customer value in AI products.
resources.author: Moe Ali / Miqdad Jaffer

resources.title: AI Cost Optimisation
resources.summary: Practical playbook for optimizing AI product costs. Covers infrastructure decisions, model selection, and operational efficiency strategies.
resources.author: Moe Ali

resources.title: Context Engineering Masterclass
resources.summary: The ultimate guide to context engineering for AI applications. Learn how to structure and optimize context windows for better AI outputs and more reliable results.
resources.author: Miqdad Jaffer

resources.title: Prompt Engineering Masterclass
resources.summary: Comprehensive guide to prompt engineering fundamentals. Covers techniques for writing effective prompts, common patterns, and best practices for consistent results.
resources.author: Moe Ali

resources.title: AI Distribution
resources.summary: Insights on AI product distribution strategies from OpenAI's product leadership. Covers the three-layer distribution framework and go-to-market approaches for AI products.
resources.author: Moe Ali / Miqdad Jaffer

resources.title: Prompt Optimization
resources.summary: Guide to optimizing prompts for better performance. Learn techniques for improving prompt efficiency, reducing costs, and achieving more consistent outputs.
resources.author: Moe Ali

resources.title: Claude Code Course for PMs
resources.summary: A dedicated course teaching Product Managers how to use Claude Code effectively. Covers practical applications, workflows, and real-world examples tailored for PM work.
resources.author: Carl Vellotti

resources.title: How to Write a Great agents.md
resources.summary: Best practices for writing effective agents.md files based on analysis of over 2,500 repositories. Learn how to configure AI coding assistants for optimal results.
resources.author: GitHub

resources.title: Vibe Coding Masterclass
resources.summary: An interactive masterclass on vibe coding - using AI assistants to build products through natural language. Covers mindset, techniques, and practical exercises.
resources.author: Shravan Tickoo

resources.title: PM Vibe Code Operations Framework
resources.summary: An operational framework for Product Managers using vibe coding in their daily work. Includes templates, workflows, and best practices for integrating AI coding into PM operations.
resources.author: bdouble

resources.title: Claude Code: Best Practices
resources.summary: Official best practices from Anthropic for using Claude Code effectively. Covers optimal workflows, common pitfalls, and advanced techniques from the team that built the tool.
resources.author: Boris Cherny / Anthropic

resources.title: Why Every PM Needs Claude Code
resources.summary: Makes the case for why Product Managers should learn Claude Code. Covers use cases, benefits, and how it can transform PM productivity and capabilities.
resources.author: Alastair Preacher

resources.title: Context is the Next Data Platform
resources.summary: Explores the concept of context as a new data paradigm. Discusses how enterprises can leverage contextual understanding to build more powerful AI applications.
resources.author: Arvind Jain

resources.title: What I Wish I'd Known Before Building My First AI Agent
resources.summary: Practical lessons learned from building AI agents. Covers common mistakes, unexpected challenges, and advice for PMs embarking on agent development.
resources.author: Jake McGwire

resources.title: ChatGPT Prompt Engineering for Developers
resources.summary: A foundational course on prompt engineering from DeepLearning.AI. Covers core techniques for writing effective prompts and building applications with LLMs.
resources.author: Isa Fulford, Andrew Ng

resources.title: LangChain for LLM Application Development
resources.summary: Learn to build LLM applications using LangChain. Covers chains, agents, and memory management for creating sophisticated AI applications.
resources.author: Harrison Chase, Andrew Ng

resources.title: LLMs as Operating Systems: Agent Memory
resources.summary: Explores the concept of LLMs as operating systems with a focus on agent memory. Learn how to build agents with persistent memory and state management.
resources.author: Letta

resources.title: Multi AI Agent Systems with crewAI
resources.summary: Learn to build multi-agent AI systems using crewAI. Covers agent collaboration, task delegation, and orchestrating complex AI workflows.
resources.author: crewAI

resources.title: Building and Evaluating Advanced RAG
resources.summary: Advanced techniques for building and evaluating RAG systems. Covers retrieval optimization, evaluation metrics, and production-ready RAG architectures.
resources.author: Jerry Liu, Anupam Datta

resources.title: Getting a $180K-$569K AI PM Role
resources.summary: A comprehensive roadmap for landing high-paying AI PM roles. Covers skills development, interview preparation, and career positioning strategies.
resources.author: Moe Ali

resources.title: Generative AI for Everyone
resources.summary: Andrew Ng's accessible introduction to generative AI for non-technical audiences. Covers what generative AI is, how it works, and its implications for business and society.
resources.author: Andrew Ng
